{{cpp/chrono/title|operator&lt;&lt;{{petty|(std::chrono::year_month_day)}}}}
{{cpp/chrono/year_month_day/navbar}}
{{ddcl|header=chrono|since=c++20|
template&lt; class CharT, class Traits &gt;
std::basic_ostream&lt;CharT, Traits&gt;&amp;
    operator&lt;&lt;( std::basic_ostream&lt;CharT, Traits&gt;&amp; os,
                const std::chrono::year_month_day&amp; ymd );
}}

Outputs a textual representation of {{c|ymd}} into the stream {{c|os}}. This first forms a {{c|std::basic_string&lt;CharT&gt; s}} consisting of a textual representation of the date in the format {{tt|yyyy-mm-dd}} (same as the one output by {{ltt|cpp/chrono/year_month_day/formatter}} with the %F specifier). Then, if {{c|!ymd.ok()}}, appends {{c|" is not a valid date"}} to {{tt|s}}. Inserts {{tt|s}} into {{c|os}}.

Equivalent to

{{cc|
return os &lt;&lt; (ymd.ok() ?
    std::format(STATICALLY_WIDEN&lt;CharT&gt;("{:%F}"), ymd) :
    std::format(STATICALLY_WIDEN&lt;CharT&gt;("{:%F} is not a valid date"), ymd));
}}

where {{c|STATICALLY_WIDEN&lt;CharT&gt;("...")}} is {{c|"..."}} if {{tt|CharT}} is {{c/core|char}}, and {{c|L"..."}} if {{tt|CharT}} is {{c/core|wchar_t}}.

===Return value===
{{c|os}}
